law.text:
If any radiation escapes from a low-level nuclear facility into the environment, the low-level nuclear waste facility permit holder shall:
Notify the Department promptly of:
The name of the radioactive substance involved;
The quantity of the radioactive substance released;
The intensity of the radiation released; and
The composition of all radionuclides of the radioactive substance in terms of constituent weights; and
Provide any additional information that the Department requests.
